channel.title: Hi... i don't see mouse when i'm in the game, i'm not saying the crosshair.
channel.description:
Hi to all... :frowning:
When i'm in the game and pause the game, can't see my mouse and have to select the options with the keyboard... it's because the requirements of my PC... ? I don't suffer low fps or something, so... :'(
Thanks for everything.
Saludos.

item.title: Hi... i don't see mouse when i'm in the game, i'm not saying the crosshair.
item.dc:creator: Maximum_Vegetto
item.description:
gnrslash95:

As a player who does see the mouse point in game, I would say there is an issue in your computer rather than the game.
Make some changes in in-game option, even though I highly doubt there will be such option as hide the mouse point.

Thank you, i’m lookin’ to it. In fact, in The Witcher and F.E.A.R. had the same problems, problems to find my mouse point. So yeah, i think is going to be a problem of my graphic card…

Saludos, .
